trans-unit.source: Configuring the database server

seg-source.mrk: Configuring the database server

target.mrk: Den Datenbankserver konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: The database system should be installed by an experienced database administrator. The various database systems differ in terms of installation and configuration and will not be explained in detail in this manual.

seg-source.mrk: The database system should be installed by an experienced database administrator.
The various database systems differ in terms of installation and configuration and will not be explained in detail in this manual.

target.mrk: Die Installation eines Datenbanksystems sollte von einem Datenbank-Administrator durchgeführt werden, da hierfür in der Regel Expertenwissen erforderlich ist.
Die Installation und Konfiguration der verschiedenen Datenbanksysteme unterscheidet sich sehr stark und wird hier nicht näher erläutert.

trans-unit.source: This section describes how to configure the database server.

seg-source.mrk: This section describes how to configure the database server.

target.mrk: In diesem Abschnitt wird beschrieben, wie der Datenbankserver konfiguriert wird.

trans-unit.source: We recommend you use MySQL Standard Edition 5.x (InnoDB Storage Engine) or MySQL Enterprise Edition 5.x (InnoDB Storage Engine), as long as your organization doesn’t specifically require you to use a different database system.

seg-source.mrk: We recommend you use MySQL Standard Edition 5.x (InnoDB Storage Engine) or MySQL Enterprise Edition 5.x (InnoDB Storage Engine), as long as your organization doesn’t specifically require you to use a different database system.

target.mrk: Falls Sie keine spezifischen Anforderungen bezüglich des Datenbanksystems haben, empfehlen wir Ihnen die Verwendung von MySQL Standard Edition 5.x (InnoDB Storage Engine) oder MySQL Enterprise Edition 5.x (InnoDB Storage Engine).

trans-unit.source: The database system is required to support transactions.

seg-source.mrk: The database system is required to support transactions.

target.mrk: Wichtig ist, dass das Datenbanksystem Transaktionen unterstützt.

trans-unit.source: If you are running a database cluster in your company, a database for the Signavio System can be created there, too.

seg-source.mrk: If you are running a database cluster in your company, a database for the Signavio System can be created there, too.

target.mrk: Wenn Sie in Ihrem Unternehmen ein Datenbank-Cluster betreiben, können Sie auch in dem Cluster eine Datenbank für den Signavio Process Manager anlegen.

trans-unit.source: A user account for Signavio Process Manager has to be created in the database.

seg-source.mrk: A user account for Signavio Process Manager has to be created in the database.

target.mrk: Sie müssen für den Signavio Process Manager in Ihrer Datenbank einen Nutzer anlegen.

trans-unit.source: Apart from the standard SQL commands <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SELECT</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UPDATE</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">INSERT</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">DELETE</kbd>, Signavio Process Manager user must be able to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">create</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">edit</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">delete</kbd> <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">tables</kbd><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">views</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">indexes</kbd> and to set <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">locks</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Apart from the standard SQL commands <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SELECT</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UPDATE</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">INSERT</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">DELETE</kbd>, Signavio Process Manager user must be able to <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">create</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">edit</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">delete</kbd> <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">tables</kbd><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">views</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">indexes</kbd> and to set <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">locks</kbd>.

target.mrk: Neben den Standard-SQL-Befehlen <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SELECT</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UPDATE</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">INSERT</kbd> und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">DELETE</kbd> muss der Nutzer des Signavio Process Managers <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Tabellen</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Sichten </kbd>und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Indexe </kbd><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">erstellen</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">bearbeiten</kbd> und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">löschen</kbd> sowie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Locks</kbd> setzen können.

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> Routines</kbd> (stored procedures) are not created by the Signavio Process Manager account. Moreover, the system doesn’t change any database user account settings.

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> Routines</kbd> (stored procedures) are not created by the Signavio Process Manager account.
Moreover, the system doesn’t change any database user account settings.

target.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Routines </kbd>(gespeicherte Prozeduren) werden nicht vom Signavio Process Manager-Konto erstellt.
Darüber hinaus ändert das System keine Kontoeinstellungen von Datenbanknutzern.

trans-unit.source: To use the <kbd data-role="ref" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> Diagnostics tool for system administrators <diagnostics> </kbd>, your database user needs to be able to create views. You can configure this right with the following command (all supported database systems):

seg-source.mrk: To use the <kbd data-role="ref" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> Diagnostics tool for system administrators <diagnostics> </kbd>, your database user needs to be able to create views.
You can configure this right with the following command (all supported database systems):

target.mrk: Um das <kbd data-role="ref" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Diagnostics-Tool <diagnostics></kbd> verwenden zu können, muss Ihr Datenbanknutzer zudem Sichten erstellen können.
Dies können Sie mit dem folgenden Befehl sicherstellen (alle unterstützen Datenbanksysteme):

trans-unit.source: with <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><dbuser></kbd> being a placeholder for your database user and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><db_schema></kbd> being a placeholder for your database schema name.

seg-source.mrk: with <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><dbuser></kbd> being a placeholder for your database user and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><db_schema></kbd> being a placeholder for your database schema name.

target.mrk: , wobei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><dbuser></kbd> für Ihren Datenbanknutzer und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><db_schema></kbd> für den Namen des Datenbankschemas steht.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, you need to grant the database user permission to read out information from a set of meta data tables:

seg-source.mrk: Furthermore, you need to grant the database user permission to read out information from a set of meta data tables:

target.mrk: Zudem ist es für die Verwendung des Diagnostic-Tools notwendig, die folgenden Leseberechtigungen auf Metadatentabellen zu erteilen:

trans-unit.source: Oracle

seg-source.mrk: Oracle

target.mrk: Oracle

trans-unit.source: MySQL

seg-source.mrk: MySQL

target.mrk: MySQL

trans-unit.source: SQL Server

seg-source.mrk: SQL Server

target.mrk: SQL-Server

trans-unit.source: with <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><dbuser></kbd> being a placeholder for your database user.

seg-source.mrk: with <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><dbuser></kbd> being a placeholder for your database user.

target.mrk: wobei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><dbuser></kbd> als Platzhalter für Ihren Datenbanknutzer steht.

trans-unit.source: Signavio Process Manager is linked to the database server via a JDBC driver. Please ensure that the database is accessible for the Signavio server through your network.

seg-source.mrk: Signavio Process Manager is linked to the database server via a JDBC driver.
Please ensure that the database is accessible for the Signavio server through your network.

target.mrk: Die Kommunikation zwischen dem Signavio Process Manager und dem Datenbankserver erfolgt über einen JDBC-Treiber.
Stellen Sie sicher, dass die Datenbank über das Netzwerk vom Server des Signavio Process Managers aus erreichbar ist.

trans-unit.source: You need the JDBC-URL of the database to configure it. Please request such an URL from the responsible database administrator.

seg-source.mrk: You need the JDBC-URL of the database to configure it.
Please request such an URL from the responsible database administrator.

target.mrk: Für die Konfiguration der Datenbankanbindung benötigen Sie eine JDBC-URL für Ihre Datenbank.
Bitte erfragen Sie die JDBC-URL bei dem zuständigen Datenbankadministrator.

trans-unit.source: Configuring MySQL

seg-source.mrk: Configuring MySQL

target.mrk: MySQL konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: Only required when using a MySQL database

seg-source.mrk: Only required when using a MySQL database

target.mrk: Nur bei dem Einsatz einer MySQL Datenbank erforderlich.

trans-unit.source: Please ensure that by default the MySQL database is encoded with <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UTF-8</kbd> and uses the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">InnoDB</kbd> storage engine. This is the only storage engine delivered by MySQL that supports transactions. Additionally, the maximum package size must be set to 16 MB.

seg-source.mrk: Please ensure that by default the MySQL database is encoded with <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UTF-8</kbd> and uses the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">InnoDB</kbd> storage engine.
This is the only storage engine delivered by MySQL that supports transactions.
Additionally, the maximum package size must be set to 16 MB.

target.mrk: Stellen Sie sicher, dass die MySQL Datenbank standardmäßig die <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">InnoDB</kbd> Storage Engine und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UTF-8</kbd> als Kodierung benutzt.
Das ist die einzige Storage Engine im Lieferumfang von MySQL, die Transaktionen unterstützt.
Setzen Sie außerdem die maximale Paketgröße auf 16 MB.

trans-unit.source: We recommend to also install the MySQL Workbench. The administration of the MySQL server is much easier with it.

seg-source.mrk: We recommend to also install the MySQL Workbench.
The administration of the MySQL server is much easier with it.

target.mrk: Wir empfehlen Ihnen, die MySQL Workbench zu installieren.
Die Administration des MySQL-Servers ist damit viel einfacher.

trans-unit.source: Those configurations are made by changing the following variables in the MySQL configuration file (<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">my.ini</kbd> or <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">my.cnf</kbd>).

seg-source.mrk: Those configurations are made by changing the following variables in the MySQL configuration file (<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">my.ini</kbd> or <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">my.cnf</kbd>).

target.mrk: Konfigurieren Sie die folgenden Variablen in der MySQL-Konfigurationsdatei (<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">my.ini</kbd> oder <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">my.cnf</kbd>).

trans-unit.source: The file should be found in the respective folder (e.g. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\ProgramData \MySQL\MySQL Server 5.5</kbd> on Windows and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/mysql</kbd> on Debian-based Linux distributions).

seg-source.mrk: The file should be found in the respective folder (e.g. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\ProgramData \MySQL\MySQL Server 5.5</kbd> on Windows and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/mysql</kbd> on Debian-based Linux distributions).

target.mrk: Die Datei sollte sich in dem entsprechenden Programmverzeichnis befinden (zum Beispiel <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">C:\\ ProgramData\\MySQL\\MySQL Server 5.5</kbd> unter Windows und <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/mysql</kbd> unter Debian-basierten Linux-Distributionen).

trans-unit.source: Use the following configuration, if you are running MySQL up to version 5.5.2:

seg-source.mrk: Use the following configuration, if you are running MySQL up to version 5.5.2:

target.mrk: Wenn Sie MySQL bis einschließlich Version 5.5.2 einsetzen, verwenden Sie die folgende Konfiguration:

trans-unit.source: Use the following configuration, if you are running MySQL version 5.5.3 or later:

seg-source.mrk: Use the following configuration, if you are running MySQL version 5.5.3 or later:

target.mrk: Wenn Sie MySQL ab der Version 5.5.3 einsetzen, verwenden Sie die folgende Konfiguration:

trans-unit.source: Create an empty database scheme for Signavio Process Manager.

seg-source.mrk: Create an empty database scheme for Signavio Process Manager.

target.mrk: Erstellen Sie anschließend ein leeres Datenbankschema für den Signavio Process Manager.

trans-unit.source: Ensure to overwrite older entries or make sure that no older entries are below their new corresponding ones. Replace if necessary, or use <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">#</kbd> to comment the lines out.

seg-source.mrk: Ensure to overwrite older entries or make sure that no older entries are below their new corresponding ones.
Replace if necessary, or use <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">#</kbd> to comment the lines out.

target.mrk: Stellen Sie sicher, dass ältere Einträge überschrieben werden oder dass sich keine älteren Einträge unter den neuen entsprechenden Einträgen befinden.
Kommentieren Sie diese gegebenenfalls mit dem Zeichen <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">#</kbd> am Zeilenbeginn aus.

trans-unit.source: If you can’t locate the configuration files, you can also edit this attributes in the MySQL Workbench.

seg-source.mrk: If you can’t locate the configuration files, you can also edit this attributes in the MySQL Workbench.

target.mrk: Sollten Sie die entsprechenden Konfigurationsdateien nicht finden, können diese Einstellungen auch komplett innerhalb der MySQL Workbench angepasst werden.

trans-unit.source: Configuring Microsoft SQL Server

seg-source.mrk: Configuring Microsoft SQL Server

target.mrk: Microsoft SQL-Server konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: Only required when using a Microsoft SQL database

seg-source.mrk: Only required when using a Microsoft SQL database

target.mrk: Nur bei Einsatz einer Microsoft SQL-Server-Datenbank erforderlich.

trans-unit.source: If you are not hosting the MSSQL Server on MS Windows, ensure that the host system supports <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UTF-8</kbd> encoding.

seg-source.mrk: If you are not hosting the MSSQL Server on MS Windows, ensure that the host system supports <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UTF-8</kbd> encoding.

target.mrk: Falls Sie dem MSSQL-Server nicht über ein Microsoft Windows-Betriebssystem bereitstellen, stellen Sie bitte sicher, dass das Hostsystem <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UTF-8</kbd> Enkodierung unterstützt.

trans-unit.source: Moreover, the TCP/IP protocol must be enabled for the database instance. To enable this, start the SQL Server Configuration Manager and selecting SQL-Server-Network configuration - Protocols for ‘INSTANCE_NAME’ in the list and activate the TCP/IP protocol. After this configuration the SQL Server must be restarted.

seg-source.mrk: Moreover, the TCP/IP protocol must be enabled for the database instance.
To enable this, start the SQL Server Configuration Manager and selecting SQL-Server-Network configuration - Protocols for ‘INSTANCE_NAME’ in the list and activate the TCP/IP protocol.
After this configuration the SQL Server must be restarted.

target.mrk: Aktivieren Sie außerdem das Protokoll TCP/IP für Ihre Datenbankinstanz.
Starten Sie hierzu das Programm SQL Server Configuration Manager und wählen Sie in der Liste SQL Server-Netzwerkkonfiguration - Protokolle für ‘INSTANZNAME‘ aus. Aktivieren Sie das TCP/IP-Protokoll.
Starten Sie den SQL-Server nach der Aktivierung neu.

trans-unit.source: Create a database user account which uses SQL Server authentication. The user name and password are required to configure the Signavio Process Manager later on. Please check, if the option SQL Server- and Windows-authentication mode is enabled in the security settings of your Microsoft SQL Server instance.

seg-source.mrk: Create a database user account which uses SQL Server authentication.
The user name and password are required to configure the Signavio Process Manager later on.
Please check, if the option SQL Server- and Windows-authentication mode is enabled in the security settings of your Microsoft SQL Server instance.

target.mrk: Legen Sie einen Datenbanknutzeran, der die SQL Server Authentifizierung nutzt.
Den hier eingestellten Nutzernamen und das Passwort müssen Sie später in der Konfiguration des Signavio Process Managers hinterlegen.
Stellen Sie sicher, dass in den Sicherheitseinstellungen des Microsoft SQL Servers die Option SQL Server- und Windows Authentifizierungsmodus aktiviert ist.

trans-unit.source: Create an empty database for the Signavio Process Explorer and assign the user account the membership db_owner for the database. Set dbo as the default scheme for the user account. Use Latin1_General_CI_AS as the database’s collation.

seg-source.mrk: Create an empty database for the Signavio Process Explorer and assign the user account the membership db_owner for the database.
Set <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">dbo</kbd> as the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">default scheme</kbd> for the user account.
Use Latin1_General_CI_AS as the database’s collation.

target.mrk: Erstellen Sie eine leere Datenbank für den Signavio Process Manager und weisen Sie dem Datenbanknutzer für die Datenbank die Mitgliedschaft db_owner zu.
Stellen Sie für den Datenbanknutzer als <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Standardschema</kbd> <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">dbo</kbd> ein.
Konfigurieren Sie als Collation der Datenbank Latin1_General_CI_AS.

trans-unit.source: Enabling snapshot isolation for Microsoft SQL Server

seg-source.mrk: Enabling snapshot isolation for Microsoft SQL Server

target.mrk: Aktivieren der Snapshot-Isolation für Microsoft SQL Server

trans-unit.source: Some database transactions in Signavio Process Manager require snapshot isolation to prevent database deadlocks. To enable snapshot isolation, execute the following SQL statements all at once ( represents the name of your database):

seg-source.mrk: Some database transactions in Signavio Process Manager require snapshot isolation to prevent database deadlocks.
To enable snapshot isolation, execute the following SQL statements all at once (<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><DbName></kbd> represents the name of your database):

target.mrk: Einige Datenbanktransaktionen in Signavio Process Manager erfordern die snapshot isolation, um Datenbank-Deadlocks zu verhindern.
Um die Snapshot-Isolation zu aktivieren, führen Sie die folgenden SQL-Anweisungen auf einmal aus (<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><DbName></kbd> steht für den Namen Ihrer Datenbank):

trans-unit.source: Configuring Oracle database

seg-source.mrk: Configuring Oracle database

target.mrk: Oracle Datenbanksystem konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: Only required when using an Oracle database

seg-source.mrk: Only required when using an Oracle database

target.mrk: Nur bei Einsatz einer Oracle Datenbank erforderlich.

trans-unit.source: Please ensure the database is using <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UFT-8</kbd> as standard encoding and create an empty database for Signavio Process Manager.

seg-source.mrk: Please ensure the database is using <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UFT-8</kbd> as standard encoding and create an empty database for Signavio Process Manager.

target.mrk: Stellen Sie sicher, dass die Datenbank <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">UTF-8</kbd> als Kodierung benutzt und legen Sie eine leere Datenbank für den Signavio Process Manager an.

trans-unit.source: When using a Linux operating system you find the configuration file by default at <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">oracle/network/admin/sqlnet.ora</kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: When using a Linux operating system you find the configuration file by default at <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">oracle/network/admin/sqlnet.ora</kbd>.

target.mrk: Unter Linux finden Sie die Konfigurationsdatei standardmäßig in der Datei <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">oracle/network/admin/sqlnet.ora</kbd>.
